pr_title: Enable can match for search with reader contexts

timeline.message: Enable can match in search with reader contexts

timeline.author: jimczi

replies.bodyText: markAsUsed is not water-tight. It's possible that the Reaper already decides to reap this reader context, then markAsUsed will be a noop, and the searcher can be closed in midway (see #20095). Should we make markAsUsed as tighten as incRef?
replies.author: dnhatn

timeline.bodyText: Unrelated but I think we can remove this comment now
